alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 07 at 9:22AM CST until November 07 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 50 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. * WHERE...In Nebraska, Dawes County, Box Butte County, Northern Sioux County and Southern Sioux County. In Wyoming, Niobrara County. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Light weight and high profile vehicles including light load semis and those towing camper trailers will be at risk.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; South Sioux
